name: Love on Paper
description:
Daniel is a writer. But lately, he's having issues. His editor said he should start going on dates to get some inspiration for the next story. However... how will it end? It's up to you!

A bit different approach to Visual Novel with multiple dating events and endings.

In the game you can:

  • take part in the bank heist!
  • save endangered species!
  • feel like a miserable loser!
  • **** the girls!
